Name: Emerald
Description: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description2$english: Finished gem obtained through basic Gemcrafting processing of raw crystal materials. Combines aesthetic appeal with practical utility.

recipes.Name: Emerald
recipes.Des: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight mastery attribute.

NeedMaterial.Name: Starlight  Emerald Lv.1
NeedMaterial.Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into Emerald.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare raw stone grown in Regnus, displaying a green hue like a deep lake in the basin.
